tweet_text:
By the most popular theory, at least, 'okay' started out as the abbreviation OK meaning 'Oll Korrect', itself a purposeful misspelling of 'All Correct'

This was part of an 'abbreviation trend' in Boston and NY in ~1838 including NG (No Go) and SP (Small Potatoes)
text_en: By the most popular theory, at least, 'okay' started out as the abbreviation OK meaning 'Oll Korrect', itself a purposeful misspelling of 'All Correct' This was part of an 'abbreviation trend' in Boston and NY in ~1838 including NG (No Go) and SP (Small Potatoes)
